I am a Software Engineer @Playstation.

When I am not building software, I work out in the gym, reading and travel and drink coffee.

If you would like to get in touch with me, whether it be for tech support, a business venture, or to just say hi, feel free to send me an email or a tweet. My email address is: kfaliagkas90_at_gmail.com and my Twitter is: @kwst_f.

Type help to see list of commands.

=== Email ===

=== Social Media ===

=== Other ===
git: View the site's source code and other developer information.
clear: Clear the contents of the terminal.
ls: List information about the FILEs (the current directory by default).
pwd: Print working directory.
cd: Change directory.
whoami: Print the user name associated with the current effective user ID.
echo: Write arguments to the standard output.
cat: Concatenate FILE(s), or standard input, to standard output.

This webShell is open source! Check out and build your own version of webShell by viewing the source code on GitHub.

A JS library called terminator.js and developed by @BrianCui powers the site's terminal-like interface. It has a simple and flexible interface for building custom "programs" and terminal commands, and is also open source.
